flawed_nl_solution:
The teams have 33 total wins because 12 + 13 + 8 = <<12+13+8=33>>33
The teams have 66 points from wins because 33 x 2 = <<33*2=66>>66
The teams have 51 total ties because 4 + 1 + 10 = <<4+1+10=51>>51
The teams have 51 points from ties because 51 x 1 = <<51*1=51>>51
The teams have 117 total points because 66 + 51 = <<66+51=117>>117
The average number of points per team is 39 because 117 / 3 = <<117/3=39>>39
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
